00219   template<int k> struct ComparePred {
00220       bool operator()(const CNExperiment* lhs, const CNExperiment* rhs) const {
00221           Err::errAbort("CNExperiment: ComparePred instantiated with an invalid compare code = " + ToStr(k));
00222           return false;
00223       }
00224   };
00225 };
00226 
00227 template<> struct CNExperiment::ComparePred<0> {
00228     bool operator()(const CNExperiment* lhs, const CNExperiment* rhs) const {
00229         return lhs->m_strExperimentName.compareTo(rhs->m_strExperimentName, 0) < 0;
00230     }
00231 };
